Name: Francisco Javier
description:
Francisco is a 25 year old young man, in an open union and the father of a son. Francisco lives in a rural area of the country, taking advantage of this opportunity to start farming coffee, basic grains and vegetables more than a decade ago as a way of earning a living, consuming the produce and also selling at markets.

Francisco feels content because he relies on the support of his family.

Recently he has visited the closest MiCr√©dito office with the purpose of purchasing bundles of manure, fertilizer, minerals, and paying for labour wages. With these agricultural materials he will be able to have a higher yield from his crops.

In the future he wishes to obtain more properties.
